Class SldPirates

java.lang.Object
org.mio.progettoingsoft.model.advCards.sealed.SldAdvCard
org.mio.progettoingsoft.model.advCards.sealed.SldPirates
public final class SldPirates extends SldAdvCard
Represents a "Pirates" adventure card in the game. This card type involves players confronting a pirate threat, requiring them to match or exceed a certain combat strength using their ship's drills. Failing to do so results in penalties like losing days or taking cannon damage. It extends SldAdvCard and provides specific implementations for pirate encounters.

  • Constructor Details

    • SldPirates

      public SldPirates(int id, int level, int daysLost, int strength, int credits, List<CannonPenalty> cannons)
      Constructs a new SldPirates adventure card.
      Parameters:
      id - The unique identifier for this pirate card.
      level - The level of the pirate encounter.
      daysLost - The number of days lost as a penalty.
      strength - The combat strength of the pirates.
      credits - The credits rewarded for overcoming the pirates.
      cannons - A list of CannonPenalty objects that may be applied.

    • loadPirate

      public static SldPirates loadPirate(com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonNode node)
      Static factory method to load an SldPirates object from a JSON node. It parses the node to extract ID, level, strength, days lost, cannon penalties, and reward, then constructs a new SldPirates instance.
      Parameters:
      node - The JsonNode containing the Pirate card data.
      Returns:
      A new SldPirates instance populated with data from the JSON node.

    • init

      public void init(GameServer game)
      Initializes the Pirates card's state and context within the game. Sets up the game and fly board references, initializes the list of allowed players (all players on the fly board), and prepares the iterator for cannon penalties. The card state is then typically transitioned by setNextPlayer().
      Specified by:
      init in class SldAdvCard
      Parameters:
      game - The GameServer instance managing the current game.

    • setNextPlayer

      public void setNextPlayer()
      Sets the next player to confront the pirates or proceeds to apply cannon penalties. If there are more players, the card state transitions to DRILL_CHOICE. Otherwise, it calls setNextCannon() to apply penalties if any players failed.
      Overrides:
      setNextPlayer in class SldAdvCard

    • setNextCannon

      public void setNextCannon()
      Sets the next cannon penalty to be applied to players who failed the strength check. If there are still cannon penalties to apply and players in the penaltyPlayers list, it sets the card state to DICE_ROLL. Otherwise, it finalizes the card's effect.

    • setNextCannon

      public void setNextCannon(String nickname, boolean destroyed, boolean energy)
      Applies the result of a cannon penalty, potentially removing energy or destroying a ship component. After applying the penalty to the specified player, it removes that player from the list of players to hit for the current cannon. If all players for the current cannon are processed, it moves to the next cannon penalty.
      Parameters:
      nickname - The nickname of the player affected by the penalty.
      destroyed - A boolean indicating if a component was destroyed.
      energy - A boolean indicating if energy was removed.

    • loadPower

      public void loadPower(Player player, List<Cordinate> doubleDrills)
      Loads the fire power (drill power) provided by a player and determines the outcome of the pirate encounter. Compares the player's total fire power (base + activated drills) against the pirate's strength. Applies penalties or rewards based on the comparison:
      • If power is less than strength: player is added to penaltyPlayers.
      • If power is greater than strength: player loses days, gains credits, and consumes energy.
      • If power is equal to strength: proceeds directly to the next cannon (no direct reward/penalty here).
      Parameters:
      player - The Player whose power is being loaded.
      doubleDrills - A list of Cordinate representing the double drills activated by the player.
      Throws:
      IncorrectShipBoardException - if an invalid coordinate is provided or a component is not a drill.
